name: Candied Citrus Peel
author: Jill
summary: You can use the peel of orange, lemon, lime or grapefruit. This recipe can easily be doubled.
ingredients: 1 cup orange peel, cut into strips
directions: Place peel strips in large saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes longer
Repeat this process two more times
In a medium saucepan, heat sugar and 1/4 cup water over high heat until boiling
Place peel in sugar mixture, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes, until sugar is dissolved
Remove peel with slotted spoon and dry on wire rack overnight
